body_content.explanation: the use or study of artificial intelligences (= computer systems that have some of the qualities that a human brain has, such as the ability to interpret language, recognize images, and learn from data supplied to them) that are able to produce text, images, etc.:
examples: The tech industry rushed to incorporate generative AI into everything from search engines to food delivery apps.
Universities have drawn up new guidelines to help teaching and assessment methods adapt to the growing use of generative artificial intelligence.

body_content.explanation: a particular artificial intelligence (= a computer system that has some of the qualities that a human brain has, such as the ability to interpret language, recognize images, and learn from data supplied to it) that is able to produce text, images, etc.:
examples: You can help the generative AI to produce the results you want by giving it more detailed prompts.
Large language models are not the only generative AIs – you have probably also used image generation models.
